Ingredients.1: 1 (1 ounce) packet Hidden Valley® Original Ranch® Salad Dressing & Seasoning Mix

Ingredients.3: 1 (10 ounce) box frozen chopped spinach, thawed and well drained

Ingredients.4: 1 (8 ounce) can water chestnuts, rinsed, drained and chopped

Ingredients.6: 1 Assorted, fresh vegetable sticks cut up for dipping

Directions.1: Stir together dips mix, sour cream, spinach and water chestnuts. Chill 30 minutes or until just before serving.

Directions.2: Cut top off the bread and remove center (using firm bread pieces as dippers). Fill bread bowl with dip. Serve with cubed bread and vegetables.
